title: North Americans in the Giro d’Italia: Stage Wins, Breakaways, and Another Pink Jersey?
content:
Del Toro, Gee, McNulty headline a 7-rider North American contingent of riders from the US, Mexico, Canada chasing pink, stages and glory at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at North Americans in the Giro d’Italia: Stage Wins, Breakaways, and Another Pink Jersey? on Velo.
author: ahood
